```{r}
library(lterdatasampler)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
pie_crab
```

```{r}
#| fig-cap: "LTER Fiddler Crabs"
ggplot(
  pie_crab, aes(x = size, y = latitude) )+
    geom_jitter() +
  labs(
    title = "Fiddler Crabs Size and Latitude")

```

These are the actual changes those other changes were a joke

```{r}
pie_crab_subset <- pie_crab %>% 
  group_by(site) %>% 
  mutate(mean_size = round(mean(size), 2),
         size_sd = sd(size),
         sample_size = n()) %>% 
  select(mean_size, size_sd, sample_size)

pie_crab_subset %>%
  kable(col.names = c("Site", "Mean", "Std. Deviation", "Sample Size")) %>%
  column_spec(1, bold = TRUE, background = "orange3") %>% 
  column_spec(2, italic = TRUE, background = "tan") %>% 
  kable_minimal() 
  
  
```
